## How should it be tested
- clone the repository\
  `git clone https://github.com/brdbank/[app].git`
- navigate to the folder\
  `cd [app]`
- checkout the feature\
    `git [feature name]`
- Install packages\
    `[comand to run]`
- Start the App\
    `[command to run]`
- Test the App\
    `[command to run]`
